title: 82 Restaurant Financial Relief Funding - National Restaurant Assoc. | Coronavirus Restaurant Impact
description: The National Restaurant Association is urging politicians to take critical steps to support America’s restaurant industry and the 15.6 million workers they employ.  In the coming days, the Association will submit additional recommendations to address the challenges confronting our restaurant owners and operators as this situation rapidly unfolds.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
